events.name: World Arduino Fan Appreciation Day
events.description:
Order tickets via Eventbrite:
http://www.eventbrite.com/e/world-arduino-fan-appreciation-day-tickets-24069483473?aff=efbevent

The World Arduino Day is a worldwide birthday celebration of Arduino and Genuino. Itâ€™s a 24 hours long event, organized directly by the community, or by the Arduino founders, where people interested in Arduino and Genuino get together, share their experiences and learn more.
For participants entirely new to Arduino, please register as a beginner and we might a hold a short masterclass depending on the response!
This event is in collaboration between Singapore Makers Association (SGMA), One Maker Group (OMG), SUTD Makerspace Club (SUTDMC) and SUTD Energy Club (SUTDEC).
events.location: The Prototyping Lab @ NDC, 111 Middle Rd, #01-02 National Design Centre, Singapore, SG
